troubleshooting.issue: MCP server configured but tools not accessible
possible_causes: MCP server not started or connected
Claude Code session doesn't have access to MCP servers
MCP configuration needs to be reloaded
Playwright MCP package not installed or initialization failed
resolution_steps: Restart Claude Code to reload MCP configuration
Verify Playwright MCP package is installed: npx -y @playwright/mcp@0.0.42 --help
Check MCP server logs for connection errors
Ensure .mcp.json is in the correct location and properly formatted
